Articles.Content:
Hey Guys!

I just got informed about KSP2 and instantly had to re-install the game!

I am playing KSP before it got published via Steam and still love it.
Since i am in constant search for news and Information about KSP2, which will be awesome for sure, i instantly created a Forum which can be found here:
https://ksp2.de

Feel free to register and discuss, share your builds, ... and i am sure that this will grow into a pretty nice community! (Only in german, sorry)

Best regards, and don't forget, always add another Booster!
Welcome and we hope your forum is as successful as ours has been.
